By Summit_trainer on Sunday, February 26, 2012 - 06:07 pm:

I've started playing, and gotten a little way. The battles and
adventures are alright. There are really no animations in
this game, I miss them,because they gave my monster more
character. The percentage of an area you have expired is an
interesting idea, and I am excited to see how that works.
Two notes.
My service is spotty where I live, so.it is hard to play at
home, and I often cannot connect at all.
I am running an HTC Incredible 2, works fine where I have
wifi.
